scripts.build: cross-env SUBDOMAIN=local node copy-config.js && tsc && browserify web/play.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] > web/dist/play-bundle.js && browserify web/index.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] > web/dist/index-bundle.js && node web/copy-dist.js
scripts.build-ezbeard: cross-env SUBDOMAIN=ezbeard node copy-config.js && tsc && browserify web/play.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] > web/dist/play-bundle.js && browserify web/index.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] > web/dist/index-bundle.js  && node web/copy-dist.js
scripts.build-index: cross-env SUBDOMAIN=local node copy-config.js && tsc && browserify web/index.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] > web/dist/index-bundle.js && node web/copy-dist.js
